title: American Splendor Presents: Bob and Harv's Comics
description: Gathered here are the collected works of the titans of adults comics Â— legendary underground cartoonist R. Crumb and the "high priest of comic-book naturalism" (Newsweek) Harvey Pekar. The comic collision of these underground luminaries is funny, obsessive, ever-so-slightly neurotic, but always biting and honest.
author: Harvey Pekar
